blocks.text: Norway's biggest day: Klaebo, Bod√∏/Glimt, and a Champions League triple-header
Two relay finals, two Norwegian gold medal chances. Klaebo in the team sprint at 09:45, then Kirkeeide and Tandrevold anchor the biathlon relay at 14:45. Block the afternoon.
‚öΩ 21:00 ‚Äî Internazionale at Bod√∏/Glimt ‚Äî UCL last 16, first leg in Milan
Historic night for Norwegian club football. Bod√∏/Glimt host Inter at Aspmyra in the Champions League last 16 ‚Äî the biggest match in Norwegian football history.
